programme.desc: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine, and Fred MacMurray are superb in this tale of love and ambition in the world of big business that went on to garner a Best Picture Oscar.

programme.title: Mimic 3: Sentinel, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: In the third creature feature in the MIMIC franchise, the bugs are back. After a group of people begin to disappear, a man hypersensitive to germs and confined to a protective bubble, decides to play detective.

programme.title: Disturbing Behavior, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: When the Clark Family moves from Chicago to Cradle Bay, Steve is cautioned by Gavin Strick about the separating factions at the local high school, where the Blue Ribbons, a club of robotic perfect students, rule.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Terrifier, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Art The Clown sets his sights on three young women, along with anyone else that gets in his way.

programme.title: Slice, (2018, Werewolves)
programme.desc: In a spooky small town, when a slew of pizza delivery boys are slain on the job, two daring survivors (Atlanta's Zazie Beetz and Chance the Rapper in a wild film debut) set out to catch the culprits behind the cryptic crime spree.

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls At Parties, (2018, Romance)
programme.desc: Worlds collide when Enn, a shy teenager in 70s London, meets the beautiful and rebellious Zan (Elle Fanning) at a party. They set in motion the ultimate showdown between their rivaling worlds and test the limits of how far they will go for true love.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Tusk, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: A U.S. podcaster (Justin Long) ventures into the Canadian wilderness to interview an old man (Michael Parks) who has an extraordinary past, and the American learns the man has a dark secret involving a walrus.

programme.title: Hex, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a mysterious disappearance on a jump, a group of skydivers experience paranormal occurrences that leave them fighting for their lives.

programme.title: Silent Hill, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Heather Mason and her father have always tried to stay one step ahead of the malevolent forces intent on their destruction. But on the eve of her 18th birthday, a dangerous revelation leads her deeper into a demonic world.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Carrie, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Horror)
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction, (1987, Drama)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas plays Dan, a New York attorney who has a tryst with seductive Alex Forrest while his wife is away. Dan later shrugs off the affair as a mistake and considers it over. But Alex won't be ignored. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.

programme.title: Stand by Me, (1986, Dramedy)
programme.desc: The story of friendship among four boys growing up amidst the laughter, danger, and adventure that binds them together. They innocently set out in search of a missing dead body, but before it is over they will be tested in ways they had never imagined.

programme.title: Explorers, (1985, Children)
programme.desc: In their makeshift laboratory, three boys use an amazing discovery and their ingenuity to build their own spaceship and launch themselves on a fantastic interplanetary journey.

programme.title: D.A.R.Y.L., (1985, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A young boy is found wandering without any memory of who he is. A family takes him in and begin to look for clues to help him find his way home.

programme.title: The Monster Squad, (1987, Horror)
programme.desc: Young kids form a club that is devoted to monsters but soon get more than they bargained for when Dracula adjourns to Earth, with Frankenstein's Monster, Wolfman, Mummy, and the Gillman.

programme.title: An American Werewolf in London, (1981, Werewolves)
programme.desc: David Kessler and Jack Goodman arrive in Northern England for a walking tour. One night, a beast attacks them, killing Jack. Weeks later Jack returns to warn David that a werewolf was their assailant, and that he is now the last of the werewolves!

programme.title: Lifeforce, (1985, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A frightening journey into the unknown awaits an Earthbound scout ship when it comes across an alien spacecraft of enormous proportions. Further investigation reveals a roomful of glass coffins containing the bodies of frozen creatures.

programme.title: The Wraith, (1986, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Jake is killed by neighborhood thugs, and returns as a mystical figure (The Wraith) to gain revenge. Starring Charlie Sheen and Randy Quaid.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Discovered by businessman Tim Daland, Cole is teamed with legendary crew chief and car-builder Harry Hogge to race for the Winston Cup at the Daytona 500. A crash nearly ends Cole’s career and he must turn to a beautiful doctor to regain his nerve.

programme.title: Chaplin, (1992, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Directed by Sir Richard Attenborough and starring Robert Downey, Jr. and an extraordinary cast, CHAPLIN is a loving, grand scale portrait of the Little Tramp’s amazing life and times.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Action)
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Runaway Jury, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: A jury fixer plays a deadly cat-and-mouse game with a jury member and a mysterious outsider who both offer to 'deliver' the verdict to the highest bidder. Soon, lives and millions of dollars are at stake in this pulse-pounder filled with twists and turns.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Get the Gringo, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: A career criminal nabbed by Mexican authorities is placed in a tough prison, where he learns to survive with the help of a young boy.

programme.title: Payback, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: Room 237, (2012, Documentary)
programme.desc: Stanley Kubrick's classic film, 'The Shining,' gets a riveting and in-depth exploration of its hidden meanings, dazzling puzzles, and even conspiracy theories.

programme.title: When We Were Kings, (1997, Documentary)
programme.desc: A documentary of the 1974 heavyweight championship bout in Zaire, 'The Rumble in the Jungle,' between champion George Foreman and underdog challenger Muhammad Ali.

programme.title: Cooley High, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: Set in 1964 Chicago, "Cooley High" is a slice-of-life tale of two high school students--best friends--coping with the challenges of everyday life and growing up in the shadows of the housing projects. Glynn Turman and Laurence-Hilton Jacobs star.

programme.title: Paris Blues, (1961, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Ram (Paul Newman) and Eddie (Sidney Poitier) are two expatriate jazz musicians living in Paris, where their music is celebrated. When they fall in love with two vacationing American girls, they must decide if they should move back to America with them.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar® for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards®, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: Inherit the Wind, (1960, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy and Fredric March go toe-to-toe in this powerful recreation of a titanic courtroom battle in which an attorney faces off against a fundamentalist in a Tennessee town where a teacher has been brought to trial for teaching Darwinism.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Eight kidnapped women. All beautiful. All talented. All in danger of having their lives cut cruelly short if police detective Alex Cross and key witness Kate McTiernan can’t locate the elusive “collector” who calls himself Casanova.

programme.title: Passenger 57, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes stars as the one man who can stop a gang of ruthless terrorists aboard a hijacked airliner in this action thriller.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or they’ll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindy’s addicted to tattling, and Jan’s hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike (Gary Cole) is a planning a surprise wedding anniversary party for Carol (Shelly Long) - until Carol's long-lost first husband, Roy (Tim Matheson), shows up to shake the family tree.

programme.title: Doc Hollywood, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Young, brash, and brilliant Dr. Benjamin Stone completes his residency at a gritty Washington D.C. hospital and heads out on a road trip to California for fun, sun and lots of money as a Beverly Hills plastic surgeon. But his plan soon turns to chaos.

programme.title: Jawbreaker, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: "The beautiful ones. The flawless four. Everyone wanted to be them. You know 'em". First there's Courtney "Satan-in-heels" Shayne and her pawn, the dense but dangerous Marcie Fox, a legend in her own little mind. Rated: R

programme.title: Fear of a Black Hat, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A mockumentary chronicling the rise and fall of NWH, a not particularly talented--or particularly bright but always controversial--hip-hop group.

programme.title: Bebe's Kids, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When ladies' man Robin meets the beautiful Jamika at a funeral service, he feels he must have died and gone to heaven.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or they’ll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindy’s addicted to tattling, and Jan’s hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike (Gary Cole) is a planning a surprise wedding anniversary party for Carol (Shelly Long) - until Carol's long-lost first husband, Roy (Tim Matheson), shows up to shake the family tree.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar®-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Lenny, (1974, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman magnificently captures the complexities and contradictions of the legendary comedian Lenny Bruce's mercurial character.

programme.title: Up in Smoke, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cheech and Chong make their film debut in this riotous rock'n'roll comedy, bringing with them the same madness, lifestyles and sketches that sold over 10 million records in the early 1970s.

programme.title: The End, (1978, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: When Sonny (Burt Reynolds) is diagnosed with a fatal disease, he swallows a bottle of pills to end it all! Instead, he ends up in a loony bin beside the demented Marlon (Dom DeLuise) who is eager to help Sonny succeed...one madcap attempt at a time!

programme.title: Coffy, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Pam Grier stars as Coffy, a one-woman vigilante force, out to even the score with those who have hooked her sister on drugs. Coffy uses her sex appeal and an assortment of weapons to rid the streets of society's scum in this cult classic.

programme.title: Friday Foster, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: No sooner has photojournalist Friday Foster (Pam Grier) been warned that her personal involvement in stories will not end happily, than she witnesses the attempted assassination of a prominent African-American figure. Now Friday is a target!

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Up in Smoke, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cheech and Chong make their film debut in this riotous rock'n'roll comedy, bringing with them the same madness, lifestyles and sketches that sold over 10 million records in the early 1970s.

programme.title: Love and Death: Love and Death, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen invades the spirit of Tolstoy in this hilarious spoof of 18th Century Russia, when Napoleon is preoccupied with perfecting his pastry and before Wellington markets his beef.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stop at an island overflowing with bubbles to get their ship modified for underwater travel, but it's not long before they stumble upon an outrageous explosion and attract unwanted attention.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TYRANNY! THE RULERS OF SABAODY, THE CELESTIAL DRAGONS

programme.title: Shakky explains why Sabaody Archipelago seems to be crawling with bounty hunters – eleven of the Grand Line's most wanted pirates are currently ashore and two of them are in Luffy's crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A mysterious stranger keeps Zoro from tangling with a powerful Celestial Dragon, and Chopper goes bonkers when Camie disappears from the amusement park.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE TARGET IS CAMIE!! THE LOOMING CLUTCHES OF A PROFESSIONAL KIDNAPPER

programme.title: Camie was abducted by a dastardly gang of kidnappers, and her next stop is the auction house unless the Straw Hats can rescue her. To make it in time, they'll have to hitch a ride on some flying fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: RESCUE CAMIE / THE ARCHIPELAGO'S LINGERING DARK HISTORY

programme.title: With a little help from their fishy mates, the Straw Hats make it to the auction house in time to save Camie, but explosive elements prevent them from taking her back by force. Luckily, Nami's concocted a very generous plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TIME LIMIT / THE HUMAN AUCTION BEGINS

programme.title: Nami's plan to save Camie goes belly up when a snot-nosed Celestial Dragon outbids the Straw Hats. Luffy and Zoro make an explosive arrival at the auction house and promptly open up a deadly can of worms.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIST EXPLODES! DESTROY THE AUCTION

programme.title: Luffy turns a mermaid auction into a pirate-style brawl when he knocks the snot out of a Celestial Dragon. With a fleet of marines out to get them, the Straw Hats will have to fight their way off the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAJOR PANIC! DESPERATE STRUGGLE AT THE AUCTION HOUSE

programme.title: They saved Camie from the auction block, but now the Straw Hats are surrounded by a fleet of marines. Lucky for Luffy, Eustass "Captain" Kidd and Trafalgar Law are ready to join the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU TAKES ACTION! SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO THROWN INTO CHAOS

programme.title: The Straw Hats join forces with Kidd's crew and Trafalgar's mates to make short work of the marines, but they're in for a surprise when they encounter a Warlord of the Sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE SIEGE! THE NAVY VS. THE THREE CAPTAINS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew duck the marines by hiding out at Rayleigh's house. While Chopper tends to Hachi, Rayleigh entertains the Straw Hats with tales of his days as first mate on Gold Roger's ship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ROGER AND RAYLEIGH - THE KING OF THE PIRATES AND HIS RIGHT HAND MAN

programme.title: Admiral Kizaru has arrived to lead the marines on a mission to wipe out all pirates. Meanwhile, Luffy and his crew prepare for a deadly battle with one of the Warlords of the Sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NO ESCAPE!? ADMIRAL KIZARU'S LIGHT SPEED KICK!!

programme.title: A groovy pirate belts out a tune that leaves Kizaru in pieces, but the admiral pulls himself together in time for a crushing Light Speed Kick. Luffy and Sanji try to protect the injured Zoro from a Warlord lookalike.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OVERWHELMING! THE NAVY'S FIGHTING WEAPONS, THE PACIFISTAS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats narrowly defeat a robot that resembles one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. But before the dust settles on the field of battle, a far deadlier foe comes looking for a fight.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EVEN STRONGER ENEMY APPEARS! THE BATTLE AXE-CARRYING SENTOMARU

programme.title: Zoro's barely breathing, and Admiral Kizaru is ready to stomp him into oblivion. The battered and beaten Straw Hats could certainly use a powerful friend right about now.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU'S FIERCE ASSAULT / THE STRAW HATS FACE CERTAIN DEATH!

programme.title: One by one, the mighty paw-print of Bartholomew Kuma makes the Straw Hats disappear until only Luffy remains. To where did his mates vanish? And will he ever see them again?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ELIMINATED FRIENDS - THE FINAL DAY OF THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Yesterday, the Straw Hats valiantly battled a Warlord of the Sea. Today, Boss Luffy and his friends at the Pinwheel Diner prepare to compete in the Great Portable Shrine Race!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / BOSS LUFFY APPEARS AGAIN

programme.title: Thriller Company sabotages the race for a sacred treasure, and the displaced Straw Hats must pull an all-nighter to rebuild their shrine and score some ancient gold!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / DEFEAT THRILLER COMPANY'S TRAP!

programme.title: Luffy finds himself stranded and starving on a strange island. The rubber-man's amazing appetite puts his manhood in danger when he devours an array of exotic mushrooms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING! THE ALL-FEMALE ISLAND, AMAZON LILY

programme.title: An army of scantily-clad women warriors want to investigate Luffy's family jewels, but the captain of the Straw Hats is more interested in reuniting with his lost mates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HURRY BACK TO YOUR FRIENDS! THE MAIDEN ISLAND ADVENTURE

programme.title: The women chasing Luffy are loyal subjects of Boa Hancock, the curvaceous Warlord of the Sea. This stone-cold beauty is deadly, and she's about to pick a fight with an entire fleet of marines!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVERYONE FALLS IN LOVE! PIRATE EMPRESS HANCOCK

programme.title: Luffy's search for a seaworthy vessel leads to a "drop-in" on the Snake Princess during the royal bathing hour. The view is world-class, but it might turn the rubber-man to stone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET HIDDEN ON THE BACKS / LUFFY AND THE SNAKE PRINCESS MEET

programme.title: Boa Hancock makes Luffy mad when she turns Margaret into a statue. The Snake Princess may have bitten off more than she can chew by challenging the captain of the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HEARTLESS JUDGMENT! MARGARET IS TURNED TO STONE!!

programme.title: The Snake Princess pits Luffy's Gum-Gum abilities against the incredible Haki power of her serpentine sisters in a fight to the death. Will Luffy survive long enough to save his statuesque friends?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DIFFICULT FIGHT FOR LUFFY! THE SNAKE SISTERS' HAKI POWER!!

programme.title: Luffy kicks his attack mode into Second Gear to save a precious statue, and the snake sisters start to feel the Straw Hat heat. At the battle's climax, Luffy makes an impression on his opponents.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ALL-OUT SPECIAL POWER BATTLE!! GUM-GUM VS. SNAKE-SNAKE

programme.title: News of Luffy's run-in with the Celestial Dragons impresses the Snake Princess, so she tells him the story of her tortured past. Will his honorable nature speed Luffy toward a reunion with his crew?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HANCOCK'S CONFESSION-- THE SISTERS' ABHORRENT PAST

programme.title: Luffy is mobbed by a hoard of pretty Kuja women eager to touch a real live man. Granny Nyon offers him a safe haven, but what she has to say might sink his plans for a Straw Hat reunion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SAVING ACE! THE NEXT STOP: THE GREAT PRISON

programme.title: Boa Hancock's illness threatens to sabotage Luffy's rescue mission. However, the Snake Princess just can't say "no" to the rubber-man, so a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOVE IS A HURRICANE! LOVE-LOVE HANCOCK

programme.title: While Luffy races to save Ace, Nami tries to survive life on Sky Island, and Franky dances up a snowstorm before making the switch from cola to tea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE SCIENCE OF WEATHER AND THE MECHANICAL ISLAND

programme.title: Chopper narrowly avoids being served for dinner in a land inhabited by giant birds, and Sanji's refined tastes land him a role as a leading lady on the island of girlish hearts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! AN ISLAND OF GIANT BIRDS AND A PINK PARADISE!

programme.title: Nico Robin finds herself trapped on the island of Tequila Wolf: a miserable land where children are forced to work as slaves. Elsewhere, Usopp tries to survive a run-in with a man-eating plant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! BRIDGING THE ISLANDS AND VICIOUS VEGETATION!

programme.title: Zoro is held against his will by the pink-haired princess of bad vibes, Brook gets mistaken for the king of darkness, and Luffy continues to eat his way toward a reunion with Fire-Fist Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! A NEGATIVE PRINCESS AND THE KING OF DEMONS!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa arrive at Impel Down, but only thirty-three hours remain until Ace's execution. To save him, the Snake Princess must find a way to hide Luffy during her full-body search!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DEADLY INFILTRATION! THE UNDERWATER PRISON IMPEL DOWN

programme.title: Time is running out on Ace, so Luffy teams up with a scoundrel who's going to pieces trying to escape Impel Down. There's no love lost between the former foes, but they'd better work together if they want to survive.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A REUNION IN HELL?! THE MAN WHO ATE THE CHOP-CHOP FRUIT!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose…

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine, the devastatingly sexy lady thief who'll stop at nothing to make her steal, has her sights set on a religious cult's secret treasure when a new man waltzes into her life: Lupin III.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A war is going down between the Italian and Chinese Mafias, and Fujiko ends up in the middle of it. A mysterious bodyguard named Daisuke Jigen stands at the heart of the matter, but who knows whose side he's really on?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: She's always getting in trouble / But she may give you a square deal / She's always sharing everything / Except for every steal / Even a lowly samurai / Is quick to see the appeal / How do you solve a problem like Fujiko Mine?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The famous diva Aiyan's bejeweled mask has been targeted by Lupin the Third, and Zenigata determines to "set a thief to catch a thief." Who will get to the mask first: Fujiko or Lupin?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Using her womanly wiles, Fujiko convinces Lupin to retrieve the legendary Laughing Peacock from an Egyptian pyramid. However, the seemingly simple job turns into a fierce race when Jigen sets his sights on the treasure too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko infiltrates a Catholic girls' school and sets about stealing all the maidens' hearts to pave the way for an even bigger theft. But Oscar knows exactly what she's up to, and he's got a plan to stop her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The nation of Carib is in political upheaval, and Fujiko is in the thick of the action, naturally. What is she doing posing as a reporter? Will revolutionary Philadel Kest win her heart where Lupin has failed? And what is Goemon doing on that fighter jet?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A fortune-teller supposedly able to predict his clients' deaths is for some reason seeking out Lupin's prior victims and giving them some very disturbing readings. What's the connection to Fujiko Mine, and how far will she go to see this job through?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Magical realism plus human trafficking plus Lupin and Daisuke Jigen plus a spa vacation plus Fujiko off the deep end equals... Well, you'll just have to find out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Count Almeida has a job for Lupin, and he's not about to take no for an answer. When Lupin and Zenigata both separately make their way to the Count's villa seeking answers, the trail of clues leads to a ghost town with just one inhabitant.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A recent string of particularly flashy thefts has been tied to Fujiko Mine, who seems to have taken to sending written warnings to the police just like Lupin does. But if you ask Inspector Zenigata, something smells fishy about the whole thing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Oscar's body is missing, girls are being kidnapped all over the world, and Lupin still hasn't made good on his threat to steal Fujiko Mine. There's only one thing to do: It's time to pay a visit to one Count Luís Yu Almeida.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 1)

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: In the season finale, all the players have finally come together, and it's time to see how the tale ends.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 2)

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Dubbed), (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award® Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Set in 79 A.D., POMPEII tells the epic story of Milo, a slave turned invincible gladiator who finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: Equilibrium, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, mankind has outlawed the things that trigger emotion-literature, music, and art. To uphold the law, a special breed of police is assigned to eliminate all transgressors. Christian Bale stars in this awesome high-tech action thriller.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned-revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: The Big Sombrero, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: Gene heads South in a fiesta of melody and a jamboree of romance. He fights for the right of rancheros to live on their rancho. Outlaws fear him and senoritas cheer him, and his famous horse Champion.

programme.title: High Noon, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper won the Oscar for the Best Actor in this classic tale of a lawman who stands alone to defend a town of cowardly citizens against a gang of revenge-seeking criminals.

programme.title: The Return of A Man Called Horse, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars in this superior sequel which follows the plight of a horribly wronged tribe of Sioux Indians and the white man who would join in their revenge.

programme.title: The Score, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: When safe cracker Nick decides it's time to settle down with his girlfriend Diane and stick to his legitimate business, running a jazz nightclub, his friend and partner Max has other plans.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Screwball)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: Southland Tales, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: SOUTHLAND TALES is an ensemble piece set in the futuristic landscape of Los Angeles, as it stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) is an action star who's stricken with amnesia.

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: In order to resolve their financial woes, lifelong platonic friends Zack and Miri decide to produce a porno film.

programme.title: Heartbreakers, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei’s been spending the past several nights chanting to learn the meaning behind the strange nightmares she’s been having.

programme.desc: Seeing the happy couples around her, Minako starts questioning her life as a Sailor Guardian and the sacrifices she has to make.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite is confident that she has finally found a person possessing the talisman. Aided by a Daimon, Kaolinate goes after her next target: Usagi.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taking Tuxedo Mask as a hostage, Kaolinite tells Usagi and the Sailor Guardians to come to the top of Tokyo Tower for their final showdown.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Following Kaolinite’s death, Eudial takes over and begins searching for the talismans. Her first target is Maya, a world-renowned Taiko drummer.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa has returned from the future to complete her training as a Sailor Guardian. She is to learn how to make friends in the twentieth century.
programme.sub-title: Making New Friends: Chibi Moon's Adventure

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: After experiencing a humiliating defeat by a Daimon, Makoto decides to retrain herself in the mountains.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls are taking a tour at one of the high schools they plan to apply to next year.

programme.title: Paging Dr. Chanda
programme.desc: Dr. Chanda interviews various individuals about their mental health journeys.

programme.title: The Pulse With Bill Anderson
programme.desc: Featuring topical discussions and interviews around current issues and events.

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruéis vikings vai à Grã-Bretanha com a intenção de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa náufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se até chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operação Zodíaco
programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos místicos - 12 cabeças de bronze dos animais do zodíaco chinês.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive é contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.

programme.title: A Saga Viking
